00050 namespace cluster {
00051 
00052   typedef size_t medoid_id;       
00053   typedef size_t object_id;       
00054 
00061   typedef std::vector< std::set<object_id> > cluster_list;
00062   
00077   struct partition {
00080     std::vector<object_id> medoid_ids;
00081 
00085     std::vector<medoid_id> cluster_ids;
00086     
00089     partition(size_t num_objects = 0);
00090     virtual ~partition();
00091 
00093     bool is_medoid(object_id oi) const {
00094       return medoid_ids[cluster_ids[oi]] == oi;
00095     }
00096 
00099     void to_cluster_list(cluster_list& list) const;
00100 
00102     void swap(partition& other);
00103     
00105     void sort();
00106     
00108     size_t size() const { return cluster_ids.size(); }
00109 
00111     size_t num_clusters() const { return medoid_ids.size(); }
00112     
00114     size_t size(size_t i) const;
00115     
00117     template <class OutputIterator>
00118     void write_members(medoid_id m, OutputIterator out) {
00119       for (object_id o=0; o < cluster_ids.size(); o++) {
00120         if (cluster_ids[o] == m) {
00121           *out++ = o;
00122         }
00123       }
00124     }
00125 
00128     void write_members_with_runs(medoid_id m, std::ostream& out);
00129 
00131     struct member_writer {    
00132       partition* p;
00133       medoid_id m;
00134       member_writer(partition *_p, medoid_id _m) : p(_p), m(_m) { }
00135     };
00136     member_writer members(medoid_id m) { return member_writer(this, m); }
00137 
00138   }; // struct partition
00139 
00140   inline std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const partition::member_writer& mw) {
00141     mw.p->write_members_with_runs(mw.m, out);
00142     return out;
00143   }

00149   std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& out, const partition& km);

00152   double mirkin_distance(const cluster_list& c1, const cluster_list& c2);
00153

00163   void expand(cluster_list& list, size_t level = 1);
00164 
00168   template <typename D>
00169   double total_dissimilarity(const partition& p, D dist) {
00170     double dissim = 0.0;
00171     for (size_t i=0; i < p.cluster_ids.size(); i++) {
00172       dissim += dist(i, p.medoid_ids[p.cluster_ids[i]]);
00173     }
00174     return dissim;
00175   }
00176 
00180   template <typename D>
00181   double total_dissimilarity(const partition& p, D dist, medoid_id m) {
00182     double dissim = 0.0;
00183     for (size_t i=0; i < p.cluster_ids.size(); i++) {
00184       if (p.cluster_ids[i] == m) {
00185         dissim += dist(i, p.medoid_ids[p.cluster_ids[i]]);
00186       }
00187     }
00188     return dissim;
00189   }
00190   
00194   template <typename D>
00195   double total_squared_dissimilarity(const partition& p, D dist) {
00196     double dissim2 = 0.0;
00197     for (size_t i=0; i < p.cluster_ids.size(); i++) {
00198       double d = dist(i, p.medoid_ids[p.cluster_ids[i]]);
00199       dissim2 += d * d;
00200     }
00201     return dissim2;
00202   }
00203 
00208   template <typename D>
00209   double total_squared_dissimilarity(const partition& p, D dist, medoid_id m) {
00210     double dissim2 = 0.0;
00211     for (size_t i=0; i < p.cluster_ids.size(); i++) {
00212       if (p.cluster_ids[i] == m) {
00213         double d = dist(i, p.medoid_ids[p.cluster_ids[i]]);
00214         dissim2 += d * d;
00215       }
00216     }
00217     return dissim2;
00218   }
